Title: HC pulls up civic body for inadequate school uniforms
Content: With lakhs of students forced to attend municipal schools in undersized or last year’s worn-out uniforms or making do with just one shirt throughout the year, the Delhi High Court on Wednesday took no
Author: Akanksha Jain
